content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Nesibe. Thank you for considering my apartment. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what your budget is for this property?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 300 euros per month.

I am a student, so I don't have a lot of money. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I am looking for a fair and reasonable rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Understood, Nesibe. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to negotiate. Based on your budget, I would suggest a rental price of 300 euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 300 euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or concerns during the lease agreement process.
name: Heinrich Heine
